message:
The ACC Champion Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets take on Washington today in the Oxford,MS regional at 4:00 p.m. 

The Jackets have played in 28 of the last 30 NCAA baseball tournaments. Can we get a #GoJackets??? -- http://c.gatech.edu/1kcD0c6
Bioengineers at Georgia Tech are developing a better way to rebuild and repair broken bones from inside the human body. -- http://c.gatech.edu/1onyDu
